name: The Creatures that We Are
author: 当季新作
content: Gao Yang, an orphan, crosses over to a &quotparallel world&quot at the age of six and starts living in a warm family of five. At the age of eighteen, Gao Yang accidentally discovers the true nature of the world: it&#039s not a parallel world at all but a mysterious realm, and the family and friends around him are all terrifying &quotbeasts&quot!
